product.title: Philips Multi Grooming Kit MG3760/33, 11-in-1 (New Model), Face, Head and Body - All-in-one Trimmer. Dual Cut Blades for Maximum Precision, 75 Mins Run Time with Quick Charge
product.categories_flat: Health & Personal Care > Beauty > Hair Care > Hair Cutting Tools > Hair Clippers & Accessories > Finishing Trimmers
product.description: The 11-in-1 all-in-one trimmer allows you to trim and style your face, hair and body at home with maximum precision,All your hair trimming needs at home. 8 impact-resistant combs - 2 stubble combs (1, 2 mm), 1 adjustable beard comb (3-7 mm), 3 hair combs (9, 12, 16 mm) and 2 body combs (3, 5 mm),Quick Charge & Run time up to 75 minutes of cordless use per charge, no-slip rubber grip for improved comfort and control,Self-sharpening, skin-friendly blades for a perfect trim,Long lasting performance - 2 plus 1 Year warranty after registration.
feature_bullets: The 11-in-1 all-in-one trimmer allows you to trim and style your face, hair and body at home with maximum precision
All your hair trimming needs at home. 8 impact-resistant combs - 2 stubble combs (1, 2 mm), 1 adjustable beard comb (3-7 mm), 3 hair combs (9, 12, 16 mm) and 2 body combs (3, 5 mm)
Quick Charge & Run time up to 75 minutes of cordless use per charge, no-slip rubber grip for improved comfort and control
Self-sharpening, skin-friendly blades for a perfect trim
Long lasting performance - 2 plus 1 Year warranty after registration
product.feature_bullets_flat: Long lasting performance - 2 plus 1 Year warranty after registration. Self-sharpening, skin-friendly blades for a perfect trim. Quick Charge & Run time up to 75 minutes of cordless use per charge, no-slip rubber grip for improved comfort and control. All your hair trimming needs at home. 8 impact-resistant combs - 2 stubble combs (1, 2 mm), 1 adjustable beard comb (3-7 mm), 3 hair combs (9, 12, 16 mm) and 2 body combs (3, 5 mm). The 11-in-1 all-in-one trimmer allows you to trim and style your face, hair and body at home with maximum precision.

top_reviews.title: Handy trimmer and groomer but slow charging
top_reviews.body: Philips MG5740/14 , received today 7th April 2021, overall good product , but in mannual its mentioned it will take 16hrs for charging from 0% to 100%. It should be mentioned in product descriptions . Other than this other things seems good. I don't know in the era of fast charging technology why Philips is still manufacturing such slow charging products. And above all philips is not mentioning it in description. I will be updating full reviews after periodic usageRead more
top_reviews.body_html:
Philips MG5740/14 , received today 7th April 2021, overall good product , but in mannual its mentioned it will take 16hrs for charging from 0% to 100%. It should be mentioned in product descriptions . Other than this other things seems good. I don't know in the era of fast charging technology why Philips is still manufacturing such slow charging products. And above all philips is not mentioning it in description.
I will be updating full reviews after periodic usage
Read more

top_reviews.title: Very good multigroomer for the price.
top_reviews.body: This product can do 99% of the task of flagship PHILIPS MG7715/15 that too for 1200/- less. I think its a steal deal. Quality of the trimmer and the accessories is top class. Its very nice to hold because of its design.  There are 3 negatives: 1. Body trimming combs can trim upto minimum of 3mm and we cannot make a clean shave of body parts. 2. There are no indicators for battery charge status. We cannot make out if its charging while plugged into power source. 3. And, it takes good 16 hours to full charge.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
This product can do 99% of the task of flagship PHILIPS MG7715/15 that too for 1200/- less. I think its a steal deal. Quality of the trimmer and the accessories is top class. Its very nice to hold because of its design.

There are 3 negatives:
1. Body trimming combs can trim upto minimum of 3mm and we cannot make a clean shave of body parts.
2. There are no indicators for battery charge status. We cannot make out if its charging while plugged into power source.
3. And, it takes good 16 hours to full charge.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Nice trimmer with good grip and water resistant
top_reviews.body: After using it for few days, here is my review for the product. Pros: 1) super easy to hold even under shower. 2) as said in the box, battery lasts for 80 minutes. 3) complete water resistant, so it's very convenient to clean. 4) there is a attachment which works like a shaver. That is really nice for clean shave. 5) my old trimmer was not safe on softer skin, however with this trimmer, I didn't found any problems.  Cons: 1) charging battery to full takes too much time. 2) it's bit difficult to change the attachment and carrying so many attachment is a bit pain. 3) I was expecting the trimmer itself will adjust the length however there are different attachments for different length. That is a bit pain.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
After using it for few days, here is my review for the product.
Pros:
1) super easy to hold even under shower.
2) as said in the box, battery lasts for 80 minutes.
3) complete water resistant, so it's very convenient to clean.
4) there is a attachment which works like a shaver. That is really nice for clean shave.
5) my old trimmer was not safe on softer skin, however with this trimmer, I didn't found any problems.

Cons:
1) charging battery to full takes too much time.
2) it's bit difficult to change the attachment and carrying so many attachment is a bit pain.
3) I was expecting the trimmer itself will adjust the length however there are different attachments for different length. That is a bit pain.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Too old model with current time period
top_reviews.body: This is too old model. It need 16 hours to charge while current model can quick charge in 1 hour. It got 12 additional pieces with different adjustments but current model comes with single piece with different adjustments supported within. There is no indicator to show if it is charging, what is the percentage of charge remaining etc. overall a outdated model in current time. Please go for advanced ones available in lesser price.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
This is too old model. It need 16 hours to charge while current model can quick charge in 1 hour. It got 12 additional pieces with different adjustments but current model comes with single piece with different adjustments supported within. There is no indicator to show if it is charging, what is the percentage of charge remaining etc. overall a outdated model in current time. Please go for advanced ones available in lesser price.

top_reviews.title: Very disappointing
top_reviews.body: When I opened the pouch the box was in open condition I suspect the product either duplicate or used.very disappointed with cluodtail and Amazon too for lack of awareness and quality check.i returned it instantly but the replacement was even worst found hair on trimmer.i don't know how come the hair come on brand new product what are the quality checks are being undertaken by Amazon and cluodtail ..... Very very disappointingRead more

top_reviews.title: Worst packing never expected for this type of international brands
top_reviews.body: Delivered in time ,The packing of this item was completely open, looks like refurbished one. Finally checked all the 12 tools were packed and available inside.but this gives a wrong feeling of this personalised product.Read more

top_reviews.title: 1 Star only for Amazon Quality Checks
top_reviews.body: I ordered this item first May 6th, received after two days but when opened , the box was already damaged and opened from down without breaking the seal, the product was used and three blades were already opened. I exchanged and got a new product on May 10th and too my disappointment , again received a damaged product box and used product. There are no quality checks from Amazon.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I ordered this item first May 6th, received after two days but when opened , the box was already damaged and opened from down without breaking the seal, the product was used and three blades were already opened.
I exchanged and got a new product on May 10th and too my disappointment , again received a damaged product box and used product.
There are no quality checks from Amazon.
Read more

top_reviews.title: All-in-One Multifunction grooming trimmer for Mens
top_reviews.body: I have been using Philps trimmer from long time now & I can say that this is one of the best trimmer which I have used so far. It comes with all the grooming attachments a men can ask for. You can use it for trimming beard, hair cut, removing hair from chest, under arm etc at convenience of home. The trimmer is easy to handle & comes with 8 strong combs to do these tasks. Looks premium & the grip is perfect. The nose & detail metal trimmer with it is cherry on the top. Go for it if you are looking for all-in-one trimmer for your grooming needs.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I have been using Philps trimmer from long time now & I can say that this is one of the best trimmer which I have used so far. It comes with all the grooming attachments a men can ask for. You can use it for trimming beard, hair cut, removing hair from chest, under arm etc at convenience of home. The trimmer is easy to handle & comes with 8 strong combs to do these tasks. Looks premium & the grip is perfect. The nose & detail metal trimmer with it is cherry on the top. Go for it if you are looking for all-in-one trimmer for your grooming needs.
